name: Super Extra Team Dungeon Game
description:
The spiritual successor to Super Extra Console Dungeon Game, where you can dive deep into the abyss of the dungeon with your stream viewers as your battle party! Awesome pixel art graphics, multiple classes, over 25 monsters, exciting boss fights and more!!!

Super Extra Console Dungeon Game is not just a game, but a tool to encourage interaction between streamers and viewers. Get ready to explore the depths of the dungeon with your team.
